messages.subject: Aware Parenting Workshops
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there! My name is Linda Wooliever and I wanted to let you know of a two-day workshop on Aware Parenting that is happening in the DC metro area (that I am
messages.messageBody:
Hi there!

My name is Linda Wooliever and I wanted to let you know of a two-day
workshop on Aware Parenting that is happening in the DC metro area
(that I am hosting.) The days of the workshops are September 14 and 15,
2002 from 9 AM to 4 PM. The presenter of the workshop is Aletha Solter.
All the details are here:

http://www.mindFULLness.org/workshops.html

These workshops are offered to parents and professionals. Couples will
receive a discount for coming together. Sliding scale offered to
parents who can't make the fee. Please call me or email me for further
information.

Linda Wooliever
301-947-1760

(posted with permission from Sandra Dodd)
